successes.title: Glyph: A Mobile Personal Theater With Built In Premium Audio
successes.description: Experience stark, vivid images like nothing you've ever seen combined with premium audio in a unique flip down form factor.

Pledges.description: A special shoutout and thank you in our newsletter! Plus we'll keep you up to date on the development process as the Glyph Beta reaches completion.
A permanent thank you on Avegant's website. Regardless of the redesign, age or vintage of the site your name will permanently be memorialized among Avegant's pages.
An Avegant Ultimate Frisbee -- 175 grams of pure ultimate joy from our team to yours, in partnership with our friends at Discraft.
Avegant Science Fuel! Support the Avegant team and get a 1lb bag of the Avegant roast from Michigan's own Ugly Mug coffee roasters.
One Glyph Beta Special Kickstarter Edition. Choose a black, white or blue headset AND pick your LED ring and HDMI cable color among Red, Green, Yellow, Avegant Blue or Black.
The real deal! One Avegant Glyph Beta device in black, white or blue.

Avegant Fanpak: One Glyph Beta of your choice (including the Special Edition), with a customized premium case as well as a pound of SCIENCE FUEL, an Avegant disc and a limited edition wool Avegant team jersey

One Glyph Beta of your choice (including Special Edition), Science Fuel, an Avegant wool pullover AND come out to the Avegant HQ for the full product experience! We'll show you around the office, let you play with the legacy of devices and give you full access to our team. Travel arrangements not included.

One Glyph Beta of your choice (including Special Edition), Science Fuel, an Avegant wool pullover, an Avegant disc signed by the team AND come out to the Avegant HQ for the full product experience and be part of our demo video! We'll show you around the office, let you play with the device and use you as a model in the instructional video we're putting together for final Glyph Beta users. Travel arrangements not included.
Work with our engineers to create one customized Avegant Glyph, from custom colors to a custom splash screen to stenciling and engraving
